I'm more of a lurker then a posted but after ploughing through this i feel i must speak up. I had a very intense /x/periance just before christmas.I took so much wonk that i experienced absolute doubt. I was trapped in an loop in my friends bedroom which then melted away into just falling through the infinite. After a while i accepted this as reality and thought the rest of my life had been a dream. Anyway that was intense enough but then i woke up the next morning and experianced absolute certainty. Screaming at the top of my voice knowing that i was HIM and i'd have to fight satan. I spat in my friends face with rage and punched him i was so wacked out. I realised i was a reawaked god and the task i had before me. Essentially i realised that all the red pill stuff i'd read was true with absolute certainty and noone could make me question it anymore. I never realised the existence of normies before either lol i thought everyone was like me. Its faded now to a certain excent in order to allow me to function in society i guess. However things have really fucking changed since then. Even the owner of this shop ive frequented since a boy totally understood when i explained everything to him llol. It didnt stop after the trip, little things keep falling into place and it all goes back to a recurring nightmare i used to have as a child where i'd be the one to set off the end times. Like id push the first dominoe and it would all start to end whilst i felt a horrible fucking feeling. Anyway the day after that i met up with a girl who ive liked for ages but nothing really happend and it went like a scene in a movie absolutely perfectly, i didnt know girls ran up to you and wrapped their legs around you etc lol it was just glorious and we kissed and i fell in love. Unforunately being the autist i am i told her that if she cucked me i'd end her lol. Then she buggerd off to work but then i bumped into her outside her job and she blanked me so i was like wtf. I litrally thought id just been sat in the pub imagining the whole thing but then i text her and she said yeah it did happen and it was perfect but your mad and i cant be dealing with that. Anyway lol supposed to be seeing her again soon so its all good. Wish we had been able to have this conversation sooner and i might have been able to share more knowledge about what i had seen on the other side but at the moment all i have is a vague impression. However shit is gonner kick the fuck off.

ID: e52f83 No.4981019>>4981058
File (hide): 1455442984097.jpg (36.39 KB, 500x205, 100:41, donkey.jpg)
>>4980945
Same here.
Besides messing around with basic robotics, some math work, basic physics, and pretty advanced biology, the GATE classes are otherwise a total blank for me too.
There was this really weird project that we did that's stuck in my mind and has been for years.
Basically, me and the four other students were supposed to make variants of PBnJ sandwiches, and make enough samples for the next two or three classes up from us to try it out.
The three girls in the class predictably made hyper-sweet kinds involving chocolate sauce, marshmallows, strawberry jam, the whole deal. They were almost all the same besides maybe one type of candy, like one involving kitkats instead of hershey's kisses on the side.
The only other boy made peanut butter and hot sauce on bagels. Pretty sure I drank almost a quart of milk from eating too many of those, I never had good tolerance for spicy food when I was a kid. But no, I didn't use any of the ingredients. I made these weird fish sandwiches that had by far the lowest rate of other students trying them, but about the third-highest rating. The teacher put the data on bar graphs and everything, even using spreadsheets.
It had some kind of tartar sauce/relish thing that I spread instead of usual condiments, I basically went against the entire lesson but the teacher actually encouraged it.
There was also this city-building thing that she had us do a lot. I usually went for a futuristic sort of style with a lot of skyways and glass-walled buildings, with park districts, working sectors, and all. The other kids were pretty haphazard though in their designs.
What was the purpose of that bullshit anyway? It all seems so meaningless with no context, at least from what I can remember.

ID: c1d6d8 No.4981028>>4981151
I see a Semi truck and think that I need to get my injuries taken care of, it's idleing and I figure a driver has to be around some where, I wait and wait. Wait some more and finally lose patience and start looking for a first aid kit, the truck was so fucking warm I considered getting out but before that happened I went to another place. A meeting, the meeting fell to shit and it was reduced to a war in my brain, darkness, the old god, chaos was all that I knew from there on out, except for the sharp interjections of reality as the police arrived and asked me to step out of the truck, I figured they were pissed at me for parking there and told them I would move to a better spot. They asked me to step out and I asked if I had a light out or some thing and what the problem was, then I remembered I wasn't a truck driver and how I got into all of this and after one more black out I stepped out of the cab.
The police are just doing their job for the most part except for one who is just being a dick and fucking with me and I know it. I asked them if I could go to the bathroom as I was cuffed and sitting half way out of the cop car, they could obviously see I was injured and covered in blood but treated me like a drunk driver, when I had to go to the bath room I asked, they said no and I started to walk towards my house, they threw me against the car, I hit my head and chipped my teeth.
The next 2 hours I spent chained up to a bench, tripping face, while C'thulu ransacks my consciousness, the cops are barking at me in demon and laughing, I keep repeating Doctor, Nurse, Priest generally the people I wanted to be there to no avail. Finally at the end of it they call in the Fire department and they take pulse and the one started yelling at the cop that was fucking with me. I had a resting heart rate of 214.
The ride to the hospital was quick, the cops took me and it happened to be the one fucking with me, as we were walking in I felt there was no end and went to end bash the sliding glass door and he stopped me and we got into a fight, I did some damage to the cop and at that point I thought I was already going to prison for "attempted theft of a vehicle" and just wanted off the ride. I ended up hitting the cop in the eye brow with my head and he's pissed and I'm pissed.
The next 6 hours I'm strapped down to a gurney, they take fluids, and leave me be. I watched the clock tick and began to recite binary, and then I went to reducing fractions, all the while undersiege by C'thulu knowing untold chaos
Then there was one word, "Enough" and I could feel every tendril retracting back to where they came. And the angle was there, I was back to normal except for the figure with me.
With a smile he was gone, I called for the nurse "looks like some one is back with us." the doctors came, the police came, gave me a ticket and left, I was unstraped from the bed, visited the pysch ward and sent off in my piss soaked pants, all my wounds had been treated, cleaned and wrapped.

I vaguely, VAGUELY (Again, I haven't thought about this shit in ages until now) remember we had dissection day for a science lesson, which was pretty special because it was a broke nigger school and the district could barely shell out for recent textbooks or paint on the walls and shit like that, so actual labwork shit was unheard of.
So we got to cut open cow eyes and hearts and such.
And I shit you not the teacher had a cooked heart, and it was cut up and passed around for us to fucking eat.
I remember distinctly thinking that it wasn't that bad. A lot like steak but tougher and stringier.
God help me what the fuck is going on here.

ID: 176851 No.4981130>>4981133
>>4980828
I have events like being observed by large, metallic, blinking, floating orbs, that then somehow went behind a cloud and seemed to change into a airplane, then disappear only for that event to be immediately followed by a state police plane flying directly over the house at tree top level, my step father was there for that, so there's a witness for that event. And other stories along those lines.
I also have events that there are no witnesses for. But I swear on my mother's life, and on the life of everyone I love, that I am not making this up, and if these events aren't real, then I'm a schizophrenic(one that happens to also have weird events that have been observed by others though too).
Events like laying in bed and getting this weird sensation seeming to take over my entire body. Kinda like my hair was standing on end, or something was about to happen, almost like something pulsing through my body maybe too, the sensation had happened the previous two nights as well. And then I become completely paralyzed(I was awake when this happened, this is not sleep paralysis, I was awake), I was able to move my eyes, and out of the corner of my room I see this entity come out of a shadow in the corner of my room, and it was the most terrifying thing I had ever seen, I tried to scream, I tried as hard as I could, but I just made some croaking sounds.
Next thing I know I'm waking up in my bed, my smoke detector is going off, and I have this terrible feeling of doom inside of me. I was laying there in bed too terrified to move. I knew I needed to because the smoke alarm was going off but I was too scared to move. Then the detector turned off. Then it turned back on again. Each time for a lesser amount of time. I walked around the house trying to smell smoke. But I never smelled anything. Every time the alarm would go off I would be filled with dread for some reason.
Finally I went into the living room and saw that I had messages on the answering machine. A ton of people had been trying to get a hold of me because some giant storm had rolled through the previous day and it had a tornado in it or something and everyone wanted to make sure I was OK.
I had no memory of a storm at all. And the reason for that turned out being that I had just had an entire day of my life taken from me. One entire day unaccounted for.
I was too afraid to tell anyone anything about that story for probably about a year. Then last year I watched a documentary about Montauk and the person on it described the event that had happened to me, with the creature coming out of the shadow to for him, and him being paralyzed in bed, a story I had never shared with a single human being. And I heard the same event that happened to me being described by someone else. And I knew I wasn't crazy.
After mentioning that event on here is when I started seeing flying orbs, police airplanes, my friends house was broken into but nothing was stolen, my internet started getting really weird, my phone that doesn't even have cell phone signal, and that I don't even keep a sim card in and only use for music, started trying to access the mic all the time, one time even connecting to the internet when there was no internet around, and draining the battery like crazy, people started driving by my friend's house in unmarked cars and talking into radios, he saw that. We use to ride four wheelers down this gravel road and smoke a joint at the cemetery at the end of the road, all of a sudden we started finding trail cameras back there, and even, I swear to god, saw some guy in Army cammies would drive down that dead end road for no reason all the time. There is a armory in my city though.
I remember also being visited by some kind of light beings as a kid. They did stuff to me and my mother, I have no idea what.
Lots of events with things I guess I would consider ghosts.
I've always had this intense sensation right between my eyes and up a little bit. I started experimenting with it and I can now instantly relive headaches and certain pains from my body by visualizing the pain exiting through that spot in my forehead.(I know this all sounds insane)
I swear to god I've had events in dreams that turned out to be real.

ID: 176851 No.4981133>>4981180
>>4981130
cont.
My entire life I've noticed that when I think about things they happen. I seem to know exactly what to do when something bad happens, there's no hesitation, I just react. I sometimes know exactly what's going to happen. Exactly what song is about to start playing on the radio, exactly what is about to be said in movie I have never seen before. Sometimes I just know something, I don't know why, I remember in school one time guessing the answers to these trivia cards they were giving us, I wouldn't think about the answer, I would just visualize the answer and say out loud the immediate first answer that came to mind, and I'd keep getting them right. I'll get lottery tickets and I know that I cannot lose, and I will win 10 random ones in a row, and I am absolutely certain that I will not lose on a single one of them, and I don't .I just do. I use to even start signing the exact same song at the exact same verse at the exact same instant as my old best friend. We would just break out in a completely random song, at a completely random moment, and we would be 100% in sync. It was insane.
I think some of you guys have noticed some of the same stuff. Seeming to know what is going to happen, maybe even making things happen. Maybe like you are plugged into the cosmic consciousness or something, or like maybe you are a architect of sorts.
But that shit is all pretty schizophrenic. But some of it is verifiable by other people. Like the floating, glowing orbs, and anytime I start feeling completely crazy, and that maybe I'm the victim of a gaslighting experiment, I remember that other people have seen this other shit.

ID: c1d6d8 No.4981151
>>4981028
I've astral projected before but nothing like that, It was by far the most mind shattering experience I had ever known,
After that I had stuck around, went to court and spoke to my probation officer whom I told every thing to, and she simply told me that they will ensare me here for ever if I stay and now was my chance to get out.
Don't worry about the warrant it's just a misdemeanor.
After that there were more signs, that lead me down the path I took to get here.
Now it's been 9 years since that day and that was only the start of it, I'm sure my experience is a tad bit more dramatic but it's no different, We've all have gone through similar stages.
For me my life breaks down into different phases, some with subphases over lapping main phases that help with the transition.
My first 7 years we're pretty normal, we never moved, I went to the same school, I did "headstart", Most notably I was reading childrens books at 2-3 and goose bumps at 3-7 and was tested with an high iq.
Then starting at 10 My life got drastically harder, my parents lost the ability to provide for us, and they were ticking timebombs tbh.
For the next 7 years my life get's pretty hard, culminating with the previous posts as the climax, then I set off traveling and continue to do so Untill 25.
Age 6, the move Age 11, the fall . Age 18, the truth, age 24 the meaning. Being huge transitional periods to the next phases.
All our personal journeys are coming together in a way that I have dreamed of every since the first time I saw it.
In the late 2010's we will begin to form, By 2033 I suspect we will all be familiar with each other.
Although I can't exactly pinpoint how every thing is going to pan out, I have seen into the future, and the stars belong to us.

Both my parents and I still get calls from odd numbers that just end with a *click* when we answer.

I spent 7 years in Headstart and remember most of it pretty clearly.
I was pissed because I thought I pissed my teachers off when they told me to color inside the lines so I colored out side the lines to test the authority, and next thing you know I'm being put into a class with some straight up autists.
One thing they had us do was with a folding chalk board and drawing half circles to see how well we could make a complete circle.
Other things such as throwing bean bags at the roof but trying to get them as high and close to the roof as possible with out actually touching it.
Lots of discussions and such, asking questions. I was enrolled 95-02.

ID: c1d6d8 No.4981561
I think they are watching us, I've brought this to pretty extreme lengths and after the fight with the cop, I know if I had been any one else I wouldn't be typing today.It's gotta be the only explanation, We're some kind of case study. But what they don't understand is that much like my parents, we are much to smart for them to handle.
I've been a shitposting wizard since early 2000s but now it all makes sense to me. The envy of all the other teachers, the fact that they couldn't control us because we were smarter. All the efforts to shit on me as discretely as possible.
I wish I could just blurt out every thing but the seven years of traveling so many things happened, I can't possibly order it all here.
So one idea that has stuck with me for so long is the 3rd Reich my whole life I have thought endlessly about it, what it did right, what it did wrong. I feel they were advanced men trying to do some thing the world wasn't ready for, they paved the way and I've always known that. It's lead me to think of the 1st and 2nd Reichs, Well friends the 4th Reich is ours, and we have much work to do.
Obviously I think this needs to be said, we're all ubermenchen, So the 3rd Reich looked down on the juden as an enemy or a burden, because they didn't know every thing we do, they lacked the centralized knowledge we have.
Look I know we're far off from a lot of things but I think we need to make an effort, we need to think for our selves, form our own institutions and this is the closest thing we have to a think tank so far.

ID: 45c466 No.4981566>>4990158
Ok /pol I have never really shared this with anyone but seeing as this thread is filled with crazy people, I would like some insight into my experiences if anyonce could offer any at all
in 2007 I went to a Music Festival and took acid for the first time. I was with my gf and her friend at the time, and didn't think it was going to kick in ever. We were inside the tent, and it was night time. Then I started to feel funny. Then my gf at the time told me she wanted to show me something, and it felt like something very important was about to happen, like there was serious mental weight bearing down. She showed me a book that she kept, she called it her acid diary or something. Everything felt so funny now, and I was fairly scared. I'm scared now, to be honest, just recalling these events, like I always am. I am breathing deeply and trying not to experience body tension and resistance so I can try to relate these experiences from a more calm and collected state of mind. But it is difficult. This experience was very traumatic to me. She showed me her diary, and it was all written in red ink. She was fairly attractive, a babe actually, but her friend was slightly troll-ish. Anyways she showed me the book, and I have no idea what the red text said, it was inconsequential. What mattered, though, was that after she showed me it, the red text in very dramatic fashion like it was CGI animated, slid off the page. It just slid right off. And she was looking at me like she was controlling this whole thing, like it was a show for me. Now I remember Something pulling me upwards, like an abduction, almost. Like an abduction into a higher realm. I'm not sure if this happened right after the red text, or not. But I remember distinctly sensing intelligent entities all around me, and I felt as though I was lying on a cold metal table almost. And it felt like I was breathing for the first time. I remember taking in a breath, and like in the matrix when they say "that's the first breath of real air you have ever taken" or whatever, this is actually very close to how it felt. And these entities were trying to "pull me through". Thoughts were flowing through me, like, has my whole life been a dream? Are they trying to resusciate me from my coma delusion back into reality? Did I have a terrible accident, and I am now going back to my "real" life? This is kind of what it felt like, like I was in a hospital. But my fear caused resistance, and so they gradually backed away from me. I didn't "hear" any voices, but I could ==sense== that what they were saying was "he is not ready, it's not going to work"
This caused me to panic, no I am ready! I am ready! (Apparently IRL I was flailing about in the tent here, and hit my gf. I have no knowledge of this. I don't know if this happened or not. After it faded, I still felt the fainter now, pull, of this event. Although the extremity of it had passed, the OVERBEARING realness of it struck me with such intensity that I felt such an urge to "go back", like nothing I had ever felt before. And then I felt, I really had to pee. And my urge to pee was like a metaphor for my bio-instincts preventing me from accessing what this was trying to show me. Apparently I was standing outside a port a potty for a very long time, and people were trying to convince me to go in. But what I actually ==remember== is that in the tent, I felt like if I could activate the part of my brain that feels the "release" of pee-ing, So eventually I tried to do this, I worked up the courage to try to do this, knowing that if I failed I would piss all over our sleeping quarters. And I felt the release of the pee. And when I opened my eyes, I was in the port a potty, finishing my piss, well outside the tent. (Honestly, this is how I remember this part, the pissing part, but this part could be fabricated. It's really hard sometimes to know if I am lying to myself.)
My gf broke up with me after this, saying that the experience of me hitting her had frightened her too much, and that even though she knew it was not my fault, she was scared to be around me now. Honestly, I think this was an excuse, she was going to university in Ottawa, and I had expressed interest in following her from Nova Scotia, although I didn't have plans to attend. She had never seemed very enthusiastic about this idea. She was kind of a weirdo, despite being hot. Sometimes would wear antenna headband to school, and fingerless gloves and purple and black striped leggings. Our relationship started in the first place because she would bug me and poke me and just do weird stuff.
Well, this broke my heart entirely, I felt like my world had totally fallen apart and all was lost. Nothing would really come close to that experience until I tried ayahuasca…

ID: 45c466 No.4981575>>4990158
File (hide): 1455448555831.jpg (257.08 KB, 960x960, 1:1, ayahuasca.jpg)
In 2011, after being totally infected with the 2012 meme, susceptible to all manners of strange suggestions after my LSD experience, I had looked into Ayahuasca, and finally found a place that looked interesting in the Amazon, called the Temple of the Way of the Light. Apparently someone had had their cancer cured there, and I felt drawn towards this place. I won't go too much into the backstory of ending up there, but it is in the Amazon rainforest in Peru, and suffice to say, is a crazy place where even weirder stuff would happen. I would stay there for 3 months, drink the brew 21 times, and have the most transcendtal experiences of my life, but mostly the most soul renderingly terrifying experiences of my life. The sessions would go like this, 2 nights drinking in a row, one night off, three nights drinking in a row, one night off, two nights drinking in a row, finish. TImes that by three, and that was my time there.
So the first night, no one had any real experience. The guy who was leading our workshop apologized and said they would brew a stronger batch. I was feeling a bit more relaxed, to be honest, as I was feeling very out of my element. Well, the second night, liftoff was acheived, for many people in the group, including myself. After that, there weren't very many night where nothing happened, except when I would specifically will nothing to happen, and purposefully only drink half the suggested dose because the previous night had been so rough. Imagine having the hardest trip you can possibly imagine, and then the next day going back for more. And then doing that again the next night. My very soul felt exhausted.
I had very scary experiences. Many times, I did not trust the shamans, and felt like they were actually evil, harvesting energy from us. Like they thought this was a joke, Westerners coming down to get healing and paying top dollar, but actually having their energy harvested. When the shamans would come over to me, sometimes I would have psychic battles with them. Like my soul would be saying to them, I know what you are doing, and theirs would say so what? What are you going to do? And all I would do is just sit there and resist them. So they would sit in front of me way longer than normal, until finally I would give in, and nothing would really happen then, they would just basically go on to the next person. I remember one night, I was psychicall battling a shaman literally into the daylight hours. We were both lying down, everyone else asleep, but our energies were so entertwined, like I just felt them so strongly and I knew they felt me too, but the whole Maloka (circular structure you drink aya in) was totally silent except for the occasioinal deep exhale coming from him. It was so unnerving to have this going on, and I considred leaving, very, very strongly, even going to get the person I had gone down with in the middle of the ceremony and telling them we have to GTFO. But ultimately, we decided to stay.
The strongest nights, although it's like comparing an atom bomb to an even stronger atom bomb, where the very end. Repeatedly, what would happen, is in the Maloka, there were 21 people drinking, all in a circle. And everyone would be lying down, very, very quiety. But I, and seemingly ONLY I, would be turned up 10000%. And everything seemed to collapse in on me. And every time I would try to rationalize, this isn't all about you, other people are having things happen as well, the brew would mock me, it would show me beyond any doubt this was ==all about me==. It genuinely began to make me feel like I was the only real person in the universe, and that everything around me was a hallucination. People would appear and dissappear, in front of my eyes. I would go out the back door, and come out the front. Someone would be talking to me telling me I was going to be alright, but it wouldn't be their voice. It was the voice of another person, who wasn't even there that night.
Also, time would stop existing. The night would just last ==forever==. There was a profound sense of timelessness, as if time had been totally shut off. And again and again, the snake would visit, this psychic snake that would slither inside and out of me, and come out when I would purge. One night I went so crazy the shaman had to make me drink lemon water, but it was a poor substitute for the help that I really desired, to help me understand, to help me assimilate, to help me process what the everloving fuck was going on.

ID: 45c466 No.4981582>>4981670 >>4981696 >>4988359 >>4990158 >>4990882
File (hide): 1455448613143.jpg (62.68 KB, 400x288, 25:18, ayahuasca-goddess.jpg)
[continued]
So the topic of this thread was "the ultimate red pill" and I guess I felt like the ultimate red pill was being displayed to me here, but in such an overwhelming and insane way that I had no idea how to swallow it. It felt like this brew, overwhelmingly, wanted me to die. Like it was saying, nothing is real, except you, now die, or rather, allow this process to occur, that you cannot mentally understand, only experience. But it was simply too frightening to think. How can I be the only person in the universe? My rational mind has 1000000 objections to this. And nothing makes sense. This entire reality, infinitely faceted, created to what, deceive me from the truth? That I am god? That there is only one? Is this initiation, but did I spectacularly fail? Or is there some crazy pan-psychic Cthulic beast that is trying to convince me to sacrifice myself so it can eat me? Because holy crap it all just felt so terrible.
Does anyone know what I am talking about? Is there anyone out there? I know I can't be the only person in the universe, because there are so many people smarted than me, so much…. But it was all the most real thing I had ever felt. Undeniably real. Trying to think "oh it's just a hallucination," while experiencing it, is laughable. If you don't have anything to add, or advice, or anything to say to me, regarding this, that is helpful, please just slide and ignore this. But if you can help in any way, I am reaching out. It's been years now, and it doesn't fuck me with every day or anything, but it's still there, and I still remember so much.

ID: 56e73b No.4981597
File (hide): 1455448757701.png (119.34 KB, 187x317, 187:317, 1420927530902.png)
This thread reminds me of a really bizarre and unnerving dream I had once when I was 17.
I was sitting by a lake, trying to skip rocks along it and beside me were three old women with hoods shrouding what they looked like. I could just tell they were old because of that weird dream intuition you get sometimes. For what seemed like a while, I just tried to skip rocks on the lake with these old women beside me, not doing anything. Eventually, I sat down on the bank of the lake and continued to try to skip rocks along the lake, I guess because my lucid legs were tired.
The instant I managed to get a rock to skip along the lake, I felt one of the old women place her hand on my shoulder. I froze for a few moments, then woke up covered in sweat, terrified and anxious. I don't know why, the dream itself wasn't terrifying but the moment I woke up I felt scared as fuck. It went away pretty quickly of course, but it's weirdness has always remained with me. Even more weird of a fact is that I remember it so clearly and vividly, and it was the first sort of lucid dream I had.

ID: 056d61 No.4981980>>4982012 >>4990158
A lot of people on this board are almost there, and some I suspect are there. The Jains had a pretty good understanding of Moksha and how reality in all of its dimensions is comprised of an infinite web of higher beings undergoing perpetual evolution. This idea has been more or less understood by a multiplicity of theologians and philosophers.
Your dreams are your step-by-step revelation. This is why the food we eat is so horrid for your brain, and why dreaming is either glossed over or infected with new-age philosophy – so that we don't learn to amalgamate our dual consciousness. Ancient civilizations and nomadic tribes were in tune to such thinking, but lacked a cogent comprehension about intuition, singularity, consciousness, etc. They just 'knew'.
Hallucinogens are keys to revealing the complexity of reality, but also the visceral truth within virtually all of us, that being the ultimate tranquil state of complete harmony. But these tools are ephemeral, and are only meant to reveal to someone that is ready a greater reality beyond the maya constructed for them by their ego and nefarious people.
You're not suppose to continue opening these gateways and abusing your brain with these drugs. Your brain simply can't handle it for an extended period of time. Not only will it affect your cognitive ability, but it will warp your perception of OUR reality. Your goal as a human being is to find enlightenment within our reality via sobriety. That is the greatest human strength and second greatest achievement; the first is guiding someone else to awakening.
Lastly, I want to remind anyone that playing around in other "worlds" with other "beings" is inane. You look like a child trying to drive a car in which your feet cannot reach the pedals, nor do you have the arm span/strength to steer your vehicle. Learn to be human and respect being human, and thus upon your passing you will be ready to move onto the next step, whatever that may be.

ID: 4e88f1 No.4984989>>4986112 >>4987693
>>4984533
Not OP, but read The Kybalion by William Walker Atkinson, then start reading The Arcane Teachings. If you like WWA, then check out his other books, Science of Breath, Mind Power and Pyschomancy were pretty good IMO, but he has lots of books on many topics. If you don't like how WWA writes, try Initiation Into Hermetics by Franz Bardon and then The Universal Master Key.
For practical stuff, read Energy Work by Robert Bruce alongside this and do the exercises everyday. Montalk has several short, but very great articles on various topics, check those out as well.
For the more political side, start with Julius Evola's Revolt Against the Modern World. If you enjoy his work, then read his part autobiography part illumination of his life and his perspective and why he wrote what he wrote Path of Cinnabar. Another good book is The Lighting and the Sun by Savitri Devi.
That's a step in the right direction.

Sewardanon back again, I was born very prematurely, about 4 weeks actually, and I was taken from my mother the moment she gave birth to me. It was only later in the day that she was able to see me, and the nurses at Anchorage Regional were extremely stubborn about not letting her for some reason.
Thank god she can practically raise hellfire when she's angry, even if she had lost a lot of blood.
One of the consequences of me being born prematurely is that the surfactant in my lungs didn't kick in quite like it was meant to, so they nearly collapsed and I had to spend roughly a week in an incubator. They thought I would come out mentally retarded with severe physical disabilities, but the only problem I've had is near-sightedness and occasional eczema, probably from some autoimmune glitch.

What's to say though that the human genome hasn't been mapped out to incredible detail, but it's all just highly classified.
They figure out which genes to manipulate to make super smart, or super intuitive humans, they then figure out how to develop humans with those desired, make those pre programmed humans, and then keep tabs on them throughout their lives to see how they've progressed.
It's not some kind of spooky, way out there thing. It's the united states government just furthering tests that were kinda pioneered by the Nazi scientists during WW2. The scientists we took in after WW2 through operation paper clip.
It's fully possible.
Also, humans do have certain powers, such as the ability to take sugar pills that magically cure us because our brains are convinced it's actually medicine. The placebo effect is actually magic when ti comes down to it. Your mind is changing it's own reality and can even go so far as to cure fucking cancer on it's own.
You find out what gene or whatever is responsible for those abilities, then you figure out how to make some kind of vaccine or something that ensures that the human born from the embryo you injected has those traits in spades.

Yeah, my parents have always been concerned about my mental health, but because of that they never took me to any kind of psychiatrist or psychologist. I was having some problems with depression in High School (who doesn't, with this modern system), so they took me to just a trained therapist without authority to put me on meds, and they immediately saw through his bullshit and ended the sessions.
Even when my GP tried to perscribe me medication to help me sleep because said depression was causing insomnia, they supported me when I was against taking it. Hydroxyzine, I think it was. Why would he perscribe a first-generation antihistamine for sleep issues?
A disturbing number of kids at my school were on ritalin, however. I always hated seeing them have to take their meds at specific times during the day, where the nurse would come in with one of those week-long pill counter things and a plastic cup with water in it. Something about it seemed fundamentally wrong to me at the time, and still does.

ID: e52f83 No.4988005>>4988083
>>4987939
What's really remarkable is that, in mathematics, I remember there being a difference between "countable" and "uncountable" infinity.
Consider the set of all given numbers, {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, … }. You can count from 6 to 7, 7 to 8, 1000 to 10001, and the set just keeps on going until the heat death of the universe and even beyond that. That's countable infinity.
Uncountable infinity is even stranger. You know how irrational numbers have a nonterminal decimal place, where there is no exactly finite value they equal? Well, consider the distance between 1 and 2. You can go from 1 to 1.1, but there's distance between that, too. So, 1.01. More distance, so 1.001, and I think you can see where I'm going with this. The number that you start with when you're counting from the divided places between 1 and 2 can be infinitely small, 1.0000000… etc. That's uncountable infinity, which I think as you describe it is "infinity contained in a state of nothing."

ID: 45c466 No.4990379
If it's interesting at all to people in this thread, four days ago (I think) me and my gf and her friend who is visiting went to a local park and smoked a herbal smoke, not sure what was in it not cannabis just a herbal smoke, they are both herbalists. Anyways, after that there was a massive meteor, or asteroid in the sky, whichever one doesn't hit the ground. Then like five minutes later, this light pops up in the sky, really bright. It was twilight so stars were just starting to come out. My gf said she saw it move upwards, I didn't see that, all I saw was the light growing in intensity, then fading out into nothingness but it had what looked like a flower contrailling out of it's four sides. Oh wait, this was the night before Chinese New Years. Anyways, we all saw it, and were pretty flabbergasted by it, especially our friend who is Chinese and fairly scientific minded. I took it as an omen of the year of the fire monkey.
I would also like to add that the thing about meeting the recurring characters, I have recently moved to the West Coast of Canada from the East, and I met a complete doppelganger of one of my friends here. He literally looks EXACTLY like him, talks the same, even laughs the same. My gf told me about him, he attends her school, or attended, she graduated, and I laughed it off, but when I met him he resembled him ==so much== that I could barely even talk to him, it was like I was instantly under the effect of some drug, and then when he laughed in the exact same way I had to go talk to someone else it was too weird.
Also, my friend is notorious for banging peoples girlfriends, friends of his, after they break up, and this guy definitely is crushing on my gf.
